display.title: Active Transformer
description: The &&3Active Transformer&&r is a multiblock used to transform energy on a much larger scale. For example, you can convert &&6HV&&r to &&7LV&&r power directly by using the apropriate energy hatches.
It also has a second function, detailed in the above quest.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o This is yet another feature from TecTech, which also required these cables to be painted. They do look fantastic if you paint them, but it's optional in CEu.
